---
title: "01_yields_data"
author: "Xolani Sibande (April 2025)"
---





Importing packages:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(here)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
here() starts at /Users/xolanisibande-dev/Papers/US_EM_MPS_spillover
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
source(here("notebooks", "packages_script.R"))
```
:::





Importing functions:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
source(here("notebooks", "functions", "fx_plot.R"))
```
:::






Import data: 




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
sheet_names <- excel_sheets(here("notebooks", "data", "yields.xlsx"))
yields_tbl <- 
  sheet_names |> 
  map(~read_excel(here("notebooks", "Data", "yields.xlsx" ), sheet = .x)) |> 
  set_names(sheet_names) |> 
  map(~rename(.x, Value = 2)) |> 
  bind_rows(.id = "Series") |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  mutate(Date = parse_date(Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")) |> 
  relocate(Date, .before = Series) |> 
  arrange(Date) 
```
:::






EDA:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
yields_tbl |> group_by(Series) |>  skim()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

Table: Data summary

|                         |                             |
|:------------------------|:----------------------------|
|Name                     |group_by(yields_tbl, Seri... |
|Number of rows           |14537                        |
|Number of columns        |3                            |
|_______________________  |                             |
|Column type frequency:   |                             |
|Date                     |1                            |
|numeric                  |1                            |
|________________________ |                             |
|Group variables          |Series                       |


**Variable type: Date**

|skim_variable |Series | n_missing| complete_rate|min        |max        |median     | n_unique|
|:-------------|:------|---------:|-------------:|:----------|:----------|:----------|--------:|
|Date          |Brazil |         0|             1|2007-03-30 |2025-04-29 |2017-11-28 |     3511|
|Date          |China  |         0|             1|2005-11-14 |2025-04-29 |2016-03-21 |     4396|
|Date          |SA     |         0|             1|1997-01-02 |2025-04-29 |2010-04-15 |     6630|


**Variable type: numeric**

|skim_variable |Series | n_missing| complete_rate|  mean|   sd|   p0|  p25|   p50|   p75|  p100|hist  |
|:-------------|:------|---------:|-------------:|-----:|----:|----:|----:|-----:|-----:|-----:|:-----|
|Value         |Brazil |         0|             1| 11.22| 2.03| 6.41| 9.92| 11.53| 12.48| 16.86|▂▅▇▂▁ |
|Value         |China  |         0|             1|  3.32| 0.61| 1.60| 2.89|  3.31|  3.67|  4.75|▁▃▇▆▂ |
|Value         |SA     |         0|             1| 10.05| 2.36| 6.03| 8.40|  9.20| 11.29| 20.69|▇▇▂▁▁ |


:::
:::





Graphing:




::: {#cell-fig-yields .cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-yields
#| fig-cap: "Long-term yields"
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 6

yields_gg <- 
  yields_tbl |> 
  fx_plot(variables_color = 3, ncol = 1, nrow = 3)
yields_gg
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Long-term yields](01_yields_data_files/figure-html/fig-yields-1.png){#fig-yields fig-align='center' width=576}
:::
:::





Exporting:




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
artifacts_yields_data <- list (
  yields_tbl = yields_tbl,
  yields_gg = yields_gg
)

write_rds(artifacts_yields_data, 
          file = here("notebooks", "outputs", "artifacts_yields_data.rds"))
```
:::
